hero.heading: Tech Due Diligence
hero.desc: Identify risks. Unlock opportunities. Build with confidence.

description: Verify and assess your company's ability to execute its roadmap and evaluate its current state.

what_is_tdd.desc: Tech Due Diligence is a structured evaluation of an organization's technology landscape. Designed to uncover hidden risks, assess readiness, and provide clarity for informed decisions.
what_is_tdd.highlight: Whether you're investing in a startup, preparing for a merger, or auditing internal capabilities, our TDD service delivers actionable insights to de-risk your tech journey.

who_is_it.desc: For those who need clarity, confidence, and insights. Before scaling, investing, or making big tech moves.

target.0: Investors evaluating the health and scalability of a product or platform
target.1: Founders/CTOs preparing for funding rounds or acquisitions
target.2: Enterprises assessing internal capabilities or third-party vendors
target.3: PE/VC Firms seeking deep-dive audits pre/post-investment

what_we_deliver.desc: From deep-dive audits to scalable systems, we deliver clarity, speed, and results. Tailored to your growth stage.

card_0.title: Software delivery performance
card_0.text: We evaluate how efficiently your team ships software:

card_1.title: Application architecture & maintainability
card_1.text: We analyze the current codebase and infrastructure:

card_2.title: IT infrastructure cost & optimization
card_2.text: We help you answer: Are you overpaying for underused systems?

how_it_works.desc: Discover how we turn ideas into impact. Our process is built to be simple, transparent, and focused on results. Every step of the way.

0.title: Discovery & interviews
0.text: We talk to engineering, product, and business teams to understand goals and context.

1.title: Hands-On audit
1.text: We dive into your repositories, CI/CD pipelines, cloud infra, and documentation.

2.title: Report & recommendations
2.text: You'll receive a comprehensive report detailing strengths, risks, and actionable next steps. With severity levels and roadmap suggestions.

3.title: Post-Audit implementation support (optional)
3.text: Need help fixing what we found? Our engineering teams can jump in and help you close the gaps.

what_you_get.desc: Everything you need to evaluate, improve, and scale. Delivered in a format that speaks to both business and technical decision-makers.

items.1: Technical audit report (code quality, architecture, infra)

why_us.desc: We bring deep technical expertise, cross-industry experience, and a hands-on approach to every audit. Our team doesn't just review code, we understand the people, processes, and pressure behind it.

reasons.0: We've audited engineering teams in tech startups, fintech, media, and public sector.
reasons.1: We're engineers ourselves, we don't just point at problems, we solve them.
